tasks.title: Validar alineacion y aprobacion de specs
tasks.description: Confirmar que 1-functional-spec.md y 2-technical-spec.md estan alineados y aprobados antes de iniciar la implementacion

tasks.title: Crear entidades de dominio Department y Municipality
tasks.description: Crear modelos de dominio puro (Department, Municipality) sin anotaciones JPA en domain/geography/model/. Incluir atributos según spec, métodos de negocio (activate, deactivate, validateUniqueness), relación Department → List<Municipality>

tasks.title: Crear excepciones específicas del dominio
tasks.description: Crear excepciones en domain/geography/exception/: DepartmentNotFoundException, MunicipalityNotFoundException, DuplicateCodeException, GeographyConstraintException

tasks.title: Implementar GeographyDomainService
tasks.description: Crear GeographyDomainService con reglas de negocio: validateDepartmentCode (2 dígitos), validateMunicipalityCode (5 dígitos), canDeleteDepartment. Incluir tests unitarios > 90%

tasks.title: Implementar GeographyValidationService
tasks.description: Crear GeographyValidationService con métodos: ensureDepartmentCodeUnique, ensureMunicipalityCodeUniqueInDepartment. Incluir tests unitarios

tasks.title: Crear migración V1.1 para tablas geography
tasks.description: Crear V1.1__create_geography_tables.sql con tablas departments y municipalities, índices (code, name, uuid, enabled, department_id), constraints (FK, UNIQUE)

tasks.title: Crear migración V1.2 con datos de Colombia
tasks.description: Crear V1.2__insert_colombia_geography.sql con 32 departamentos y 1,100+ municipios de Colombia con códigos DANE reales

tasks.title: Documentar modelo de base de datos
tasks.description: Crear diagrama ER (Department 1:N Municipality), documentar índices, constraints y plan de mantenimiento

tasks.title: Crear JPA entities
tasks.description: Crear DepartmentEntity y MunicipalityEntity con anotaciones JPA en infrastructure/out/geography/persistence/entity/. Incluir relaciones @OneToMany/@ManyToOne y campos de auditoría

tasks.title: Crear Spring Data JPA repositories
tasks.description: Crear DepartmentJpaRepository y MunicipalityJpaRepository con queries personalizadas (findByCode, findByUuid, findByEnabled, findByNameContaining, etc.)

tasks.title: Crear mappers con MapStruct
tasks.description: Crear DepartmentEntityMapper y MunicipalityEntityMapper para conversión Domain ↔ Entity usando MapStruct

tasks.title: Implementar repository adapters
tasks.description: Crear DepartmentRepositoryAdapter y MunicipalityRepositoryAdapter implementando DepartmentPort y MunicipalityPort. Incluir tests unitarios con Mockito

tasks.title: Definir puertos de salida (repository interfaces)
tasks.description: Crear DepartmentPort y MunicipalityPort en application/port/out/ con métodos: save, findByUuid, findByCode, findAll, delete, etc.

tasks.title: Implementar use cases de Department
tasks.description: Crear CreateDepartmentUseCase, UpdateDepartmentUseCase, GetDepartmentUseCase, ListDepartmentsUseCase, DeactivateDepartmentUseCase, SearchDepartmentsUseCase en application/port/in/department/

tasks.title: Implementar use cases de Municipality
tasks.description: Crear CreateMunicipalityUseCase, UpdateMunicipalityUseCase, GetMunicipalityUseCase, ListMunicipalitiesUseCase, SearchMunicipalitiesUseCase, AutocompleteMunicipalitiesUseCase en application/port/in/municipality/

tasks.title: Implementar validaciones transversales
tasks.description: Validar que departamento exista antes de crear municipio, validar códigos únicos, validar que departamento no tenga municipios antes de eliminar

tasks.title: Tests unitarios de use cases
tasks.description: Tests unitarios de todos los use cases mockeando puertos de salida. Verificar lógica de negocio. Cobertura > 90%

tasks.title: Documentar casos de uso
tasks.description: Crear diagramas de secuencia para flujos principales y documentar reglas de negocio por caso de uso

tasks.title: Crear DTOs
tasks.description: Crear DTOs en infrastructure/in/api/geography/dto/: CreateDepartmentRequestDto, UpdateDepartmentRequestDto, DepartmentResponseDto, CreateMunicipalityRequestDto, UpdateMunicipalityRequestDto, MunicipalityResponseDto, MunicipalityAutocompleteDto con anotaciones de validación

tasks.title: Crear mappers DTO con MapStruct
tasks.description: Crear DepartmentDtoMapper y MunicipalityDtoMapper para conversión Request/Response ↔ Domain

tasks.title: Implementar DepartmentController
